## Cookie.domain property

The 'Domain' attribute of the cookie represents the domain the cookie belongs to (See [RFC6265 Section 5.2.3](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc6265.html#section-5.2.3)<!-- -->).

**Signature:**

```typescript
domain: string | null;
```
